method.name: GetInt
method.comment: Returns the int value represented by the string associated with the specified key in this preference node. Returns def if key is not found

method.name: GetKeys
method.comment: Returns all of the keys that have an associated value in this preference node.

method.name: GetFloat
method.comment: Returns the float value represented by the string associated with the specified key in this preference node. Returns def if key is not found

method.name: Flush
method.comment: Forces any changes in the contents of this preference node and its descendants to the persistent store.

method.name: PutBoolean
method.comment: Associates a string representing the specified boolean value with the specified key in this preference node.

method.name: PutString
method.comment: Associates the specified String value with the specified key in this preference node.

method.name: Clear
method.comment: Removes all of the preferences (key-value associations) in this preference node.

method.name: GetLong
method.comment: Returns the long value represented by the string associated with the specified key in this preference node. Returns def if key is not found

method.name: PutByteArray
method.comment: Associates a string representing the specified byte array with the specified key in this preference node.

method.name: GetBoolean
method.comment: Returns the boolean value represented by the string associated with the specified key in this preference node. Returns def if key is not found

method.name: GetDouble
method.comment: Returns the double value represented by the string associated with the specified key in this preference node. Returns def if key is not found

method.name: GetByteArray
method.comment: Returns the byte array value represented by the string associated with the specified key in this preference node. Returns def if key is not found

method.name: PutFloat
method.comment: Associates a string representing the specified float value with the specified key in this preference node.

method.name: GetString
method.comment: Returns the String value associated with the specified key in this preference node. Returns def if key is not found

method.name: PutDouble
method.comment: Associates a string representing the specified double value with the specified key in this preference node.

method.name: PutInt
method.comment: Associates a string representing the specified int value with the specified key in this preference node.

method.name: Remove
method.comment: Removes the value associated with the specified key in this preference node, if any.

method.name: PutLong
method.comment: Associates a string representing the specified long value with the specified key in this preference node.
